title: The Shanahanaissance in S.F. and Points Per First Downs  | The Dantasy Football Podcast (Ep. 282)
description:
The Ringer’s Danny Heifetz and Danny Kelly list their “thank me later” players to target in drafts (02:00) and explain why they’re intrigued by the 49ers receivers (14:30) and deterred by Jon Gruden’s comments on Jordy Nelson and Martavis Bryant (23:45). Then the Dannies are joined by editor Riley McAtee, who shreds PPR leagues and advocates for a new type of fantasy scoring system (28:45).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
